Text.Page:
If you do not destroy it from above, it will be impossible for us to break through in the center.

Keep hailing down the bullets! We will break through the walls ourselves.
Perhaps the sorcerer has a way of helping us.

Once you have stormed the fortress entrance, under fire, and crossed the bridge behind it, you scale the wall where you eliminate all the siege cannons and archdevas. Thanks to your heroic deeds, the Federation was able to invade the fortress.

This draught should protect you against the worst of the blast. Won't be perfect, of course, but you should survive.

But try not to dawdle once you drink it.

, down there!

The archdevas don't realize we've gotten inside! Now's our chance to catch them unawares!

Our losses weren't as heavy as I'd feared. Well done.

Are you ready to end this?
